ai-tha-ap154:2.1_0: Seeing a flower belly with the top,
ai-tha-ap154:2.2_0: I was well placed in the charnel ground,
ai-tha-ap154:2.3_0: Having taken hold of a Mango,
ai-tha-ap154:3.4_0: I sat at the root of the Bodhi tree.
ai-tha-ap154:4.4_0: I sat in the supreme awakening.
ai-tha-ap154:5.1_0: I paid homage to the Bodhi (Tree),
ai-tha-ap154:5.3_0: if she stands unfit for her;
ai-tha-ap154:6.2_0: it was all over the flower.
ai-tha-ap154:6.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap154:6.4_0: this (true) fruit is recommended by the Awakening One,
ai-tha-ap154:7.1_0: and third is the third eon.
ai-tha-ap154:9.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Tambapaṇṇi.
ai-tha-ap154:10.1_0: to get the second and third in the Elder Ambapālī’s Wood.
